page.title: 14CHANGES THAT EFFECT LIFE
page.content: In the early 1960's,the Grand Union {Canal }was drained.The area is now used for grazing of livestock,but it course can still seen. The coming of Milton Keynes to the area meant that there were many changes. At Thornton College the coming of {computers}is a new area in teaching for the girls. Also a new sports hall has been built, which is to be opened in July.As well as the{sports}hall other buildings have been built. At Thornborough Mill old{ barns}are being converted into houses.Many barns in the area are not being converted,but left derelict while newer barns are being used. The owners of Thornborough Grounds now have less land.This is because they sold some land three years ago.
